page.title: 01Lytham St. Annes - Overview
page.content: The area for our survey stretches from Ashton Gardens,Lytham St Annes,to Blackpool Airport. It is an area of open land,water and buildings. Much of the open land takes the form of sand dunes which border the beach and seashore.In amongst the sand dunes are a nature reserve and the St Annes Old Links Golf Club.Much of the area to the west of our survey is open sea,and at low tide many channels and sand banks appear. The area has many contrasting styles of buildings.There are Victorian houses,very modern houses and small factories.Many of the streets are tree lined and facing the sea are apartments and blocks of flats. The area is very popular with visitors throughout the year but especially in the summer months.
